628310.name: Fantasy Grounds - No Legged Fiends (Token Pack)
628310.description:
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.
This token pack contains 48 tokens:Fiends without feet, most of these tokens either slither or creep over the ground a few float and a couple more swim.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
